short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and share your awesome links!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using the bookmark.red services , you remain entirely in control - you find your bookmarks or receive recommendations (shared resources) on a specific subject of interest according to your request from the users or groups you select. Creating open or closed groups by interest will help you and your friends, colleagues, and collaborators collectively explore the web sharing experience between you. The system can help you find new things to read, watch, learn and do so in proven ways recommended by the people you trust. It may also help you become an influencer, sharing your knowledge and vision with others.
